# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/darwin-x64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/pygments/filters/__init__.py
@source-hash: 87f928624505a3e1
@generated: 2026-02-09T17:57:42Z

This module serves as the central registry and lookup mechanism for Pygments syntax highlighting filters, providing both built-in filters and plugin discovery functionality.

## Core Responsibilities
- Filter discovery and instantiation via name-based lookup
- Plugin filter integration through `find_plugin_filters()`
- Collection of 8 built-in filter implementations for text transformation

## Public API Functions

**find_filter_class(filtername)** (L22-29): Returns filter class by name, checking built-in FILTERS registry first, then scanning plugins. Returns None if not found.

**get_filter_by_name(filtername, **options)** (L32-42): Factory function that instantiates a filter with given options. Raises ClassNotFound exception if filter doesn't exist.

**get_all_filters()** (L45-49): Generator yielding all available filter names from both built-in registry and plugins.

## Built-in Filter Classes

**CodeTagFilter** (L65-95): Highlights special code tags (TODO, FIXME, etc.) in comments and docstrings. Configurable tag list via `codetags` option. Uses regex pattern matching to identify and transform tags to Comment.Special tokens.

**SymbolFilter** (L97-684): Converts LaTeX/Isabelle mathematical symbols to Unicode characters. Contains extensive symbol mapping dictionaries (latex_symbols L111-308, isabelle_symbols L310-669). Language selection via `lang` option (default: isabelle).

**KeywordCaseFilter** (L687-712): Transforms keyword token casing (lower/upper/capitalize). Uses string method delegation pattern via `getattr(str, case)`.

**NameHighlightFilter** (L715-753): Retypes specific name tokens to different token types (default: Name.Function). Accepts `names` list and `tokentype` options for customization.

**RaiseOnErrorTokenFilter** (L760-786): Exception-throwing filter that raises when Error tokens are encountered. Configurable exception class via `excclass` option with validation.

**VisibleWhitespaceFilter** (L789-865): Converts whitespace characters to visible Unicode symbols. Complex option handling for spaces (·), tabs (»), newlines (¶) with configurable replacement characters and token type control.

**GobbleFilter** (L868-904): Removes fixed number of leading characters from each line. Implements stateful character counting across line boundaries via `gobble()` helper method (L886-890).

**TokenMergeFilter** (L907-928): Merges consecutive tokens of identical types for output optimization. Maintains state between tokens to accumulate values.

## Helper Functions

**_replace_special(ttype, value, regex, specialttype, replacefunc)** (L52-62): Core utility for regex-based token transformation. Yields original tokens for non-matching segments and transformed tokens for matches.

## Module Registry

**FILTERS** (L931-940): Central mapping of filter names to classes. Used by lookup functions and serves as the authoritative registry for built-in filters.

## Dependencies
- Uses Pygments token types (String, Comment, Keyword, Name, Error, Whitespace)
- Integrates with plugin system via `find_plugin_filters()`
- Relies on utility functions from `pygments.util` for option parsing
- Inherits from base `Filter` class for consistent interface

## Architecture Notes
- Filter classes follow consistent pattern: `__init__(**options)` + `filter(lexer, stream)` method
- Stream processing uses generator pattern for memory efficiency
- Options parsing standardized via utility functions (`get_list_opt`, `get_choice_opt`, etc.)
- Symbol mappings are comprehensive but static - no runtime symbol resolution
